function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"The text discusses the impact of brand image on consumer attitudes and brand equity, but does not address the risk of contagious diseases propagation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contagious spread of misinformation about green brands and environmental benefits leading to consumer deception and confusion.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Viral spread of negative perceptions about green brand practices, leading to a loss of brand equity and consumer trust.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contagious transmission of consumer skepticism and distrust towards green brand claims, leading to a decline in market share and profitability.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of differentiation in brand associations","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective brand positioning","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of consumer interests and choices","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of brand awareness","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative brand image","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of brand recognition and recall can lead to decreased customer loyalty and market share.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to differentiate brand associations from competitors","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases such as covid-19 due to close interaction in the built environment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited literature and research on the relationship between green trust and satisfaction, which may impact the understanding of consumer behavior towards eco-friendly products.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of disposable face masks contributing to environmental pollution and waste.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Environmental pollutants play a significant role in the spread of covid-19","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of adoption of environmentally friendly business practices","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to incorporate green marketing in all activities of the firms","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Encouraging new behaviors through government policies","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in online retailing due to social distancing measures and fear of infection","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through touch-based technology, such as self-checkout counters","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on frontline retail employees","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Slow adoption of self-checkout technology","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of long-term human resource strategies","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased exposure to contagious diseases due to working with larger crowds and handling returned items.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Verbal abuse and threats from frustrated customers due to new safety measures and restrictions.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Perception of low social status and lack of glamour in retail work, exacerbated by pandemic-related challenges.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Crowding in supermarkets leading to increased risk of contagious disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low wages leading to irregular working hours and minimal qualifications","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased reliance on local suppliers may lead to a decrease in the quality of products","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of strong relationships with suppliers","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on single suppliers","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Retailers sourcing from a wider geographic region may increase the risk of spreading contagious diseases through the distribution chain.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Operating 24/7 and providing retail services whenever and wherever the consumer demands may increase the risk of transmission of contagious diseases due to higher foot traffic and frequent interactions.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate replenishment of goods during the pandemic resulted in consumers quickly switching to other retailers, potentially increasing the spread of contagious diseases as people move between different stores and locations.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exacerbation of disruptions due to government measures like social distancing","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Adoption of technologies and online shopping due to evolving pandemic situation","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing in the hospitality industry","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased workload in risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Emotional stress and strain on retail employees","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Abandoned grocery baskets leading to
